1: ni//skye ba bdag ni rigs yin no//de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i thar pa yin zhe na/dngos grub thams cad rjes chags phyir//'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das//kun grub
2: zad med bde ba yin//bde ba chen po zhes 'dod do//gsang ba khrag 'thung zhes bya ste//phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa'i phyir//mchog ni pad+ma 'dzin rgyal po//dam tshig dam pa shes ldan phyir//dgyes
3: pa dam pa nyi ma ste//sbyin pa la sogs mchog sgrub phyir//thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs//rdo rje rta mchog las nyid phyir//sangs rgyas kun dngos sems dpa' ste//rdzogs sangs rgyas
4: phyir rnam snang mdzad//rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal chen po//ye shes rdo rje 'dzin mchog phyir//de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gsum nyid yin zhe na/'jig rten gsum dag mtha' yas phyir//
5: 'dul phyir srid gsum mchog gsum bdag/thams cad nyid phyir dkon mchog gsum//'jig rten gsum bdag khams gsum yin//de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad nyid yin
6: zhe na/sems can bsod nams cher 'phags phyir//mi g.yo thams cad kho na bdag/sems 'du 'bral phyir g.yo ba ste//kun byed thams cad kho na'i phyir//mkha' 'gro ma bdag lha mor
7: gsungs//thams cad mdzad pas skal ba bzang //rnam par rtog pa skal ngan par//brda yis mtshan mar gsungs pa'o//de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das dang po'i snying po dbyangs 'byung ba'i
8: ye shes kyi rgyu yin zhe na//gtan du srid pa yang dag 'grub//dbang phyug chen po 'grub don du//dpa' bo'i dngos grub kun don du//bskal pa'i dang po bcom ldan gsungs//'dod chags
